title: Drawing, "Sagittarius, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on blue laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: Sagitario 3 autunno, superimposed over sagitario 2, in graphite: squared off in graphite, at sides 1-4 and at top and bottom 1-8 with light source symbol at middle right
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Winged putto-centuar shooting his bow and arrow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sagittarius, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1193.
